content: IMPERIALSymbol: Â IMPDescription:IMPERIAL is the autonomous company dedicated to the sustainable development of a diversified portfolio of crypto assets and creating value for its investors by combining digital business with classic business.IMPERIAL token has been created on the BNBChain platform (BEP-20).The token is under development.More information can be found in the Whitepaper.Website: https://impcoin.org/Whitepaper v1.0: LINKTelegram: LINKContact us for general questions:info@impcoin.orgContact us for marketing questions:marketing@impcoin.orgContact us for a direct purchase of the IMPERIAL token during the development phase:sales@impcoin.orgPlease follow the LINK for the opportunity to participate in the mining test.

comments.author: Bivis777
comments.body: An interesting project, but very difficult to implement. How do you plan to raise so much capital?

comments.author: Larty
comments.body: Quote from: Bivis777 on March 15, 2023, 09:38:17 AMAn interesting project, but very difficult to implement. How do you plan to raise so much capital?Hello, sorry for the late response. We have developed a strategy and will gradually implement it step by step. We are not scammers in order to collect money from people as soon as possible and disappear. Everything will be carried out according to the planned development strategy. Yours sincerely, IMPERIAL Public Relations Team

comments.author: Larty
comments.body: Please follow the LINK for the opportunity to participate in the mining test.
